Skill.label: Wave of Conviction - keep it Lv1
Auras - Devouring Diadem + Aspect of the Spider
Flame Dash - Second Wind missing in PoB
Steelskin - seperate links from Flame Dash

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Included are all passive tree steps, gem setups and all rare and unique gear choices.
How to use: - Choose a passive tree in the bottom-left dropdown menu, and adjust your level at the top - Adjust the example gear or import your own stuff with the Import/Export Build feature - Add Enchantments and Anointments that you plan to use - Adjust gem levels and quality if needed - Configure anything relevant in the Configuration tab
For DPS calculations: - Set "Is the enemy a Boss?" to Shaper/Guardian for most relevant calculations - Change "Exposure Type" to "Lightning" and put a checkmark on "Do you use Power Charges?" - Shock is tricky, a good baseline is 10% so activate "Is the enemy Shocked?" and put 10 as "Effect of Shock" - Put a checkmark on any conditional buffs you get through various sources, such as Consecrated Ground or Tailwind - Add Arc DPS and Orb of Storm DPS together, then add Orb of Storm Average Hit multiplied by Arc Cast Rate to that
- For burst DPS, activate all Flasks in the Items tab and set "Is Pendulum of Destruction active" to Elemental Damage - If using CInderswallow Urn and you have any Fire Damage added to Arc, put a checkmark on "Is the enemy Ignited?"
Small notes: - All rare gear uses the most recommended affixes for that slot with average rolls - Lightning Resistance is symbolic for each resistance/attribute you may add - Gems that don't need quality or need to stay at a certain level are shown like that, all others are defaulted at 20/20
If something seems unclear, please try finding the answer in the guide first!
